fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Bunker: Use in the day to give yourself Powerful Defense in the following night. This will lock you out of reading and speaking in the Evil Chat until the night ends. Can only be used 3 times in a game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, every evil faction will be allowed to win with each other, as long as they kill every player who isn't in an evil faction, even if they're a neutral who wouldn't normally oppose any evil faction.
- Every evil faction will share a single chat, which you are also a part of by default, but roles and other important information won't be shared there.
- Individual evil factions still have their own private chats open as usual.
If you die, the evil faction chat will immediately close, and the evil factions will no longer be aligned.
- If a member of an evil faction kills you, each member of their faction will gain a single-use Unstoppable Defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Lead all the evils to victory without letting them betray you.
